title: Semantic Token Configuration Schema (Minimal)
description: Schema for defining semantic token classes and scope extraction using Tree-sitter. Captures are injected automatically in code.

^[a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_-]*$.description: Configuration for a single programming language. The property name is the language identifier (e.g. 'python').

shared_token_queries.description: Semantic token classes and the Tree-sitter patterns used to extract them.

^[a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*$.description: Definition of a semantic token class, e.g., function_class, variable_class.

description.description: Optional human-readable description of what this class represents.

queries.description: List of Tree-sitter patterns for this class. Captures are automatically assigned in code.

pattern.description: Tree-sitter S-expression pattern for matching nodes. Do not include capture name.

scope_queries.description: Patterns used to detect scope boundaries. Captures are automatically named 'scope'.

queries.description: List of Tree-sitter patterns that mark scope start/end.

pattern.description: Tree-sitter pattern for scope-bearing nodes. Do not include capture name.

ignore_nodes.description: Node types to ignore when building token mappings (e.g., comments, string literals).
